page.title: 09A DAY IN A CHILD'S LIFE-1.
page.content: {Roger Beech}is an 11 year old pupil at{Pentrecelyn school.}He lives at {Tyddyn Farm. Roger usually wakes up at 7.30,and after watching Breakfast T.V. he either walks or bikes the short distance to school. He says that he enjoys{mathematics, especially addition.However{games}of all types are his{favourite activity. He has played{football}for the school since he was 8, and this year,while winning the local league(un-beaten) Roger scored{64 goals(a record). Roger enjoys chips in the school casheteria although curry,rice and chips is his favourite meal. After leaving school at 3.15,Roger usually has a cup of tea while playing on his small snooker table. Roger helps on the 100 acre farm.
